existing_features.title: Remove the second photo/image shown near the top of the website page by deleting the Hero parallax background layer that renders `/assets/generated/layered-background.dim_1920x1080.jpg` in `frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx`.

If the static asset file exists in the repo, delete the corresponding static image file `/assets/generated/layered-background.dim_1920x1080.jpg` from frontend static assets so it no longer consumes project storage.

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove the second photo/image from the top of the website page

projectName: Remove the second top-of-page hero background image
